dashboard.label: User Audit - Splunk accounts
dashboard.description: Dashboard concentrates on internal Splunk based accounts that are defined on this Splunk instance

search.query: index=_audit action=edit_user (operation=create OR operation=remove) | table _time, operation, user, object, info | rename info AS status, user AS src_user, object AS dest_user
index=_audit action=edit_roles (operation=create OR operation=remove) | table _time, operation, user, object, info | rename info AS status, user AS src_user, object AS role

index=_audit action="password change" OR (action="edit_user" AND operation="create") | eval user=if(operation=="create",object,user) | stats latest(_time) AS lastpwchange by user | eval lastpwd_day_ago=round((now()-lastpwchange)/60/60/24, 1) | convert ctime(lastpwchange) | sort - lastpwd_day_ago
